description:
Yami has awakened as the forbidden organic weapon, Darkness, with a goal like nothing Yami would even dream of... Meanwhile, Mea struggles to escape her bonds within the realm of Nemesis`s mind. One by one, Rito`s friends fall victim to Darkness, and then she finally catches up to Rito himself! Then, just as Darkness`s blades draw near...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Prediction Is Impossible: Bousou Suru Yami
